revised_title: A New Instrument for Accurately Determining Latitude at Sea
tldr: The author presents a new instrument for determining latitude at sea, which can be easily understood by seamen and provides accurate results. The instrument can also be used to find the time of day and is useful for navigation. The method involves taking two observations of the sun or stars and using the instrument to draw arcs on a celestial globe to determine the latitude of the location.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Marine Science
